title: Google\Cloud\Functions\V2\SecretEnvVar
name: SecretEnvVar
description:
Configuration for a secret environment variable. It has the information necessary to fetch the secret value from secret manager and expose it as an environment variable.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.functions.v2.SecretEnvVar

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Project identifier (preferably project number but can also be the project ID) of the project that contains the secret. If not set, it is assumed that the secret is in the same project as the function.

params.name: data.secret
params.description: Name of the secret in secret manager (not the full resource name).

params.name: data.version
params.description: Version of the secret (version number or the string 'latest'). It is recommended to use a numeric version for secret environment variables as any updates to the secret value is not reflected until new instances start.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description:
Name of the environment variable.

Generated from protobuf field string key = 1;
